alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 12:28PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside and northeastern San Diego Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1228 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Anza, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Palm Springs, Anza, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Cahuilla Indian Reservation, Oak Grove, Santa Rosa Mountain, and Los Coyotes Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
